subject: " Could not create Failure Detail View "?
msgSnippet: A resent: has anyone encountered (if not solved) this problem before? and I do not demand or expect an answer ;-) Olivier
messageBody:
A resent:
has anyone encountered (if not solved) this problem before?
and I do not demand or expect an answer ;-)
Olivier
> -----Original Message-----
> From: FILLON, Olivier [SMTP:olivier.fillon@...]
> Sent: Friday, 21 December 2001 8:00
> To: 'junit@yahoogroups.com'
> Subject: [junit] Could not create Failure Detail View popup box?
>
>
>
> > Hi fellow junit addicts,
> > a short question and easy one ?
> > I have been using junit for a while now.
> > Using 3.6 here, in a new place, some of my colleagues get a
> > "Could not create Failure Detail View, using default view" popup box
> when
> > starting the junit.swingui.TestRunner
> >
> > But some others (and myself) do not get the message box.
> > The configs look the same ;-( very puzzling.
> > Does not seem to affect the behaviour but maybe for overloaded failure
> > class
> > Any idea ?
> > Thanks in advance
> > Olivier
> > SoftOz Australia for Suncorp Metway
> >
> > Olivier Fillon
> > Phone: 07 38361185
> > Mobile: 0417 762 651
> >
> > email: Olivier.FILLON@...
> > eGIS group
> > Suncorp Metway
> >
